Package org.purewidgets.shared.im

Class Summary
Application Represents an application in the interaction manager server.
InputEventHelper A class to help trigger widget input events.
Place Represents a place in the interaction manager server.
UrlHelper Provides methods for creating the REST urls for the interaction manager.
Widget Represents a widget in the interaction manager.
WidgetInput The WidgetInput class represents an input from a user to an option of a widget.
WidgetOption A WidgetOption represents an item or option, within a widget, that can be independently selected by a user.
WidgetParameter A WidgetParameter is a name/value pair.
 

Enum Summary
ApplicationState The state of the application, when requesting application from the interaction manager.
